content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
Food was amazing and service was great. I got the 5 item plate and it was so amazing to be able to try different items. Even though they give small portions its enough to fill you up because I had four other items. So amazing- i will be going again when I am in that area.
